name: Death Game: Starting as a Trickster, Pretending to Be a God
summary: “When I thought death was the end, I opened my eyes only to realize… it was just a new beginning.”After being killed by a junior he thought was going to confess to him, Lin Yu discovered he hadn’t actually died. Instead, he found himself in a deadly game!Only the winner has a chance to “live again.”Luckily, Lin Yu awakened the unique class — Fraudster:【Any lie he tells, as long as someone believes it, becomes reality!】Watching the other players, all lost and confused, Lin Yu chose to pretend to be a god in order to win the game!“Welcome to my game — little lambs!”And in the endless string of death games that followed…With the power of the 【Fraudster】, Lin Yu eventually became a real god!
author: 暴力紫皮人
